body:
I also like the world "_requirements_" – "_prerequisites_" sounds softer. But it's a good suggestion to leave that to the mentors.

What about this:

> Skills students should have, ideally or as a hard requirement – e.g. good knowledge of a specific programming language, proficiency with CSS, etc. Maybe illustrate via a coding challenge that needs to be completed (on Exercism.io, Codeschool, Codewars or somewhere else).
